item.title: [COLOR lime]Unete al grupo en Telegram :[/COLOR][COLOR yellow] https://t.me/ProyeckMotors[/COLOR]
[COLOR lime]Tu granito de arena :[/COLOR][COLOR yellow] paypal.me/magyckpi[/COLOR]
[B][COLOR orange]* [/COLOR][/B][B][COLOR deeppink] ZONA PRIVADA[/COLOR][/B]

regex.name: getinput
regex.expres:
#$pyFunction import xbmcgui,xbmc, xbmcaddon, time
def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,txt='Contraseña'): addon = xbmcaddon.Addon('plugin.video.MagyckPi') addon_version = addon.getAddonInfo('version') profile = xbmc.translatePath(addon.getAddonInfo('profile').decode('utf-8'))
solver = InputWindow( txt=txt) solution = solver.get() if solution == 'proyeckmotors': return "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/RetroBlogPi/ProyeckMotors/master/carrerasmotor.xml"
class InputWindow(xbmcgui.WindowDialog): def __init__(self, *args, **kwargs):
self.txt = kwargs.get('txt','')
xbmcgui.WindowXMLDialog.__init__(self) #self.addControl(self.txt) path = xbmcaddon.Addon().getAddonInfo('path') self.kbd = xbmc.Keyboard() self.kbd.setHeading( self.txt)
def get(self): self.show() time.sleep(2) self.kbd.doModal() if (self.kbd.isConfirmed()): text = self.kbd.getText() self.close() return text self.close() return False
